Subskills.name: Incisive Cuts
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by surgical blood letting.

Subskills.name: Cutting Edge
Subskills.description: Inflict bleeding to targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Surgeon's Vortex
Subskills.description: Knives now orbit around you slowly going outwards.

Subskills.name: Bolting Scalpels
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of surgical blood letting.

Subskills.name: Expert Surgeon
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using surgical blood letting.

Subskills.name: Vitality Devourer
Subskills.description: Chance to restore life on hit for a portion of your additive physical damage.

Subskills.name: Exsanguination
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to inflict increased bleed damage.

Subskills.name: Plhebotomist
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding enemies.

Subskills.name: Cutting Storm
Subskills.description: Knives have a chance to conjure a spinning knife tornado on hit dealing increased damage over time.

Subskills.name: Sanguine Eruption
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a ripple of blood on hit dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Swift Precision
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using surgical blood letting.

Subskills.name: Lifeblood Harvest
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to increase damage dealt according to your vitality.

Subskills.name: Blood Thaumaturgist
Subskills.description: Throw multiple knives in an arc. The knives stick to the targets for a short duration before pulling back to you dealing increased damage according to your vitality.

Subskills.name: Fracturing Knifestack
Subskills.description: Throw a knife with increased projectile speed exploding into multiple piercing knives to all directions on hit.
